name: Amorican Nonja Warnior
description:
Traverse over three obstacles! Compete with... yourself... to be the greatest Nonja in all of Amorica: the latest country in the Soviety Bloc.  (not be be confused with American Ninja Warrior).  Use wasd or the arrow keys to move and space to jump.

Note - When you jump, your starting velocity stays the same. You cannot control movement in the air. In other words, if you run up to a platform, stop, and jump ... you jump straight up and cannot move forward. You must back up and get a running start.
